results.content: Welcome to Falcon Taxis 24/7. Thank you for calling. One of our team members will be with you shortly to assist with your booking. With our reliable round-the-clock service, we're ready to get you where you need to be whenever you need us. Please hold, and one of our team members will be with you shortly.
Hello. Can I have taxi, please? [...].
Say where you are going to.
